tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE social_media_interactions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    post_text TEXT,
    interaction_time TIMESTAMP,
    sentiment_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE social_media_interactions (
  interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  interaction_date DATE,
  user_id INT,
  post_text VARCHAR(255),
  likes_count INT,
  comments_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE BrandReputation (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    brand_name VARCHAR(255),
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    sentiment_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerFeedback (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE SentimentAnalysis (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    sentiment_text TEXT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    analysis_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  interaction_date TIMESTAMP,
  sentiment_score FLOAT);

CREATE TABLE users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  account_created_date TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE brands (brand_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  brand_name VARCHAR(50),
  industry VARCHAR(50),
  brand_reputation_score FLOAT);

CREATE TABLE feedback (feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  interaction_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  feedback_date TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE Brand_Overview (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    brand_name VARCHAR(255),
    average_rating FLOAT,
    positive_reviews_count INT,
    negative_reviews_count INT
);
